nodes.bodyText: Indeed, stupid of me. File removed.
We probably should remove the test dependencies (xxx-tests, xxx-itests, xxx-test, test-utils), I am not sure publishing them in BOM is useful, wdyt?

nodes.bodyText:
I don't think that it is a good idea, should be for each user to decide. Example: what if one'd want to develop additional test utility classes for their project using the CXF test utils?
Also there are multiple pom.xml in CXF that use cxf-testutils without scope test:
systests/rs-sse/rs-sse-base/pom.xml, systests/cdi/base/pom.xml, ...
